post_text: June 28, 2016 at 8:57â€¯PM#1Hi to allAnyone would know how to park the effectform of a parameter, but not the parameter value itself?For exemple, park the effectform of the dimmer for some fixtures to prevent an effect modify the output, but still have the availabilty to modify the normal value of the dimmer, with the dimmer wheel, a cue or the grandmaster.Something like an Effect-Only-Protect...Thanks to all
title: How to park the effectform of a parameter?
